SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BoardModel
The BoardModel class represents the game board and the pieces in the game.
BoardModel.Color
Enum representing the color states of a game piece.
ComponentGenerator
Interface for generating and managing UI components in a game.
ComponentGenerator.Color
Represents a color using RGB values.
ComponentGenerator.FieldType
 
ComponentGenerator.HorizontalAlignment
Enum representing horizontal alignment options for UI components.
ComponentGenerator.VerticalAlignment
Enum representing vertical alignment options for UI components.
GameClient
Abstract class representing a game client that interacts with the game controller.
GameController
GameController manages the game logic, including piece placement, movement, and tracking player turns.
GameScreen
 
Initializer
The `InitAll` class initializes and manages the main components of the game, including game screens, saved games, and map selection.
IntTuple
 
Line
Custom class for representing a line segment defined by two points (x1, y1) and (x2, y2).
Main
 
MainMenuScreen
Represents the initial graphical user interface (GUI) for the game.
MapModel
Represents the model of a game map, including locations, lines, groups, and associated data.
PlayerColor
Enum representing the two player colors in the game.
SaveState
Represents the save state of a game, including the board configuration, player pieces, and game phase information.
SwingComponentGenerator
SwingComponentGenerator is a concrete implementation of the ComponentGenerator interface using Java Swing.
UserGameClient
Represents a game client for a user player, extending the base GameClient class.
